page.title: 16COSTRUCTION SUPERVISOR
page.content: My day starts at 8.30am after running the two boys to school, when I call at one or two building sites where I am responsible for supervising the construction work. I return home about 10.30am have coffee, discuss the days programme with my assistant. We try to do any letter-writing or planning and building regulation applications in the morning so that my wife can type these before the boys return from school. The afternoon is spent on the drawing board producing sketch,design or detail drawings between phone calls. When it is essential to be undisturbed we switch on our telephone answering machine. We draw on tracing paper using either pencil or ink and the end of the day is spent taking prints using the ammonia printer in basement.
